generic-dao 0.9.17-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
javax.persistence  
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api These generic DAO interfaces can be used to handle basic DAO operations (save, delete, etc) for persistent objects in an application, choose the one that meets your needs or extend one.
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.annotations These interceptors provide safe ways to get to the data being handled by the generic dao methods before and after they are called
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.annotations.enums  
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.caching The cache provider allows for optional caching and control over the caching for generic dao operations
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.finders These finder interfaces contain additional dependency safe functions which can extend the functionality of the GenericDao.
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.interceptors These annotations allow us to define the link between our persistent classes and the database without configuration files
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.mappers These Mappers allow a developer to programmatically define the connection between persistent objects and the database
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.modifiers These modifier interfaces contain additional dependency safe functions which can extend the functionality of the GenericDao.
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.search These search beans contain additional dependency safe classes which can be used for searches and deciding what data to return
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.translators Defines database differences and translates between different databases
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.base  
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.base.caching  
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.hibernate These hibernate based generic DAO implementations can either be used directly to handle persistent object operations in an application or extended to meet more specific needs.
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springjdbc These spring jdbc based generic DAO implementations can either be used directly to handle persistent object operations in an application or extended to meet more specific needs.
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springjdbc.translators  
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springutil Utilities which support spring usage across classloaders
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util Utilities which support JDBC and a few other misc things which assist with the generic dao
